Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was great to be part of the recent Investor Relations awards and I do hope you had a great evening.
PGi, are a global provider of fully managed conference call and webcasting solutions, integrating our audio with market leaders, ON24 and NASDAQ QMX to maximise your audience participation.
PGi offer dedicated Event Managers to become familiar with your specific requirements and protocols and with our average staff tenure at 5 years plus you can feel confident that your next IR communication will be of the highest standard.
I currently work as the Manager for IR Events with PGi’s Investor Relations clients,and would welcome the opportunity to have a 30 minute meeting to learn more about your requirements and share come ideas with you on how we may be able to enhance your next event experience.
Please do let me know of any available times over the coming weeks.
In the meantime why not download our new ebook; "The Little Black Book of Presentation Ideas" to help you put that WOW factor into your next presentation.
